sqlItem.sql: select taskCount ,round(taskCount*100/2882,1)||'%' as bl from ( select count( DISTINCT f_xjxzqhdm) as taskCount from tbhztj_stat_taskdatainfo where f_stat_taskcode='${taskCode}')e

WITH A AS ( SELECT f_xzqhdm,bm01 FROM tbhztj_sd_edsddbllb_result WHERE f_stat_taskcode = '${taskCode}' AND substr(f_xzqhdm ,5,2)!= '00' and dlh='NC' and ed_sjnf=2017 ), b AS ( SELECT f_xzqhdm,bm01 FROM tbhztj_sd_edsddbllb_result WHERE f_stat_taskcode = '${taskCode}' AND substr(f_xzqhdm ,5,2)!= '00' and dlh='N+' and ed_sjnf=2017 ) , c AS ( SELECT f_xzqhdm,bm01 FROM tbhztj_sd_edsddbllb_result WHERE f_stat_taskcode = '${taskCode}' AND substr(f_xzqhdm ,5,2)!= '00' and dlh='N-' and ed_sjnf=2017 ), d as (SELECT a.f_xzqhdm,a.bm01 as bm01_nc,b.bm01 -c.bm01 as bm01 FROM A,b,c where a.f_xzqhdm=b.f_xzqhdm and c.f_xzqhdm=b.f_xzqhdm),
e as (select round( sum(bm01)/sum(bm01_nc)*100,1) ||'%' as bm01_bl_Z from d where bm01>0), f as (select round( sum(-bm01)/sum(bm01_nc)*100,1) ||'%' as bm01_bl_J from d where bm01<0) select * from e,f

SELECT round(hj / 10000, 2) AS hj, round(gdmj / 10000,2) AS gdmj, round(gdmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS gdmjbl, round(qtnydmj / 10000,2) AS qtnydmj, round(qtnydmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS qtnydmjbl, round(ktzdlmj / 10000,2) AS ktzdlmj, round(ktzdlmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS ktzdlmjbl, round(jkhfqtnydmj / 10000, 2) AS jkhfqtnydmj, round(jkhfqtnydmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS jkhfqtnydmjbl, round(gchfqtnydmj/10000, 2) AS gchfqtnydmj, round(gchfqtnydmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS gchfqtnydmjbl, round(qtdlmj/10000, 2) AS qtdlmj, round(qtdlmjbl*100, 1)||'%' AS qtdlmjbl FROM tbhztj_sd_fj2_yjjbntnew_result WHERE f_stat_taskcode = '${taskCode}' AND f_xzqhdm = '${xzqdm}'
